name: Amnesiac Adventurer (RTGSGames)
description:
Greetings!

Our brave adventurer has finally arrived at the Dungeon of Doubt, ready to see what treasures and dangers await! After taking his first few steps, he suddenly finds himself standing at the 13th floor of the dungeon! Wait, what just happened? Our adventurer has vague memories of going through the previous floors, but he can't remember how, exactly. Help our forgetful friend figure out how he travelled through each level!

Amnesiac Adventurer is a puzzle game with a twist, where everything is backwards! Try and “unsolve” the puzzles as you delve deeper into the dungeon.

Please give us your feedback via the Google Form! It would mean a lot tous and will help us refine the game further! Feedback form link: 

https://forms.gle/qNB1iB3SAzdyfXBP8

 First Release Version 0.1.1 4 October 2021
